headline: Does AbbVie's Bispecific Trial Win and R&D Pledge Change The Bull Case For AbbVie (ABBV)?
summary: AbbVie recently announced topline Phase 3 results from the EPCORE DLBCL-1 trial, showing improved progression-free survival and response measures for epcoritamab versus chemoimmunotherapy in adults with relapsed or refractory diffuse large B-cell lymphoma, but without a statistically significant overall survival benefit. Alongside these data, AbbVie and Genmab plan to engage regulators on next steps, underscoring how bispecific T‑cell engagers could reshape treatment options for patients...

Alongside these data, AbbVie and Genmab plan to engage regulators on next steps, underscoring how bispecific T‑cell engagers could reshape treatment options for patients...
